nowhere.translation[0].definitions[0].de: not in any place or to any place
nowhere.translation[0].definitions[0].ex: Nowhere is drug abuse more of a problem than in the US.
I have no job and nowhere to live.
nowhere.translation[0].note_box[0].items: Don’t use nowhere  with another negative word such as ‘not’ Use anywhere You say
You must not smoke anywhere in the building
You must not smoke nowhere in the building
